thread.section_title: Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Would love to go back!
thread.title_full: Would love to go back! - Review of Hotel Villa Saxe Eiffel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JTLW
title: Would love to go back!
text:
Staying here in March 2017 for 4 nights. I have frequent biz trips to Paris every year for past 5 years, therefore I love to try different hotels. This one is definitely one of my favourite 2 so far!!
10 mins to Segur metro station of metro 10. Located in a quiet and lovely residential area. The staffs are very friendly and helpful. The bed is comfortable, the room size is moderate. The breakfast and its dining room is where I enjoy most!!
As I'm not a pure tourist type, I don't really need to get a place nearby many tourist spots in Paris. This hotel suits me very well.
